game.castle

Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.castle.Castle

  • public class Castle
extends java.lang.Object
    Castle on the board, owned by a duke.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Castle(Board board, Duke duke, Position position)
      Construct a castle on a position of the board, owned by a duke.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Castle

        public Castle(Board board,
              Duke duke,
              Position position)
        Construct a castle on a position of the board, owned by a duke.
        Parameters:
        board - Board where the castle is.
        duke - Duke that own this castle.
        position - Position of the castle on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • clearProductionQueue

        public void clearProductionQueue()
        Clear the production queue.

      • finishAction

        public void finishAction()
        Finish the current action.

      • finishProduction

        public void finishProduction()
                      throws ExceptionDukeNotPlayer,
                             ExceptionEmptyProductionQueue
        Finish the current production (first on the production queue).
        Throws:
        ExceptionDukeNotPlayer - Thrown if the duke of the castle is not playing: he couldn't ask a production.
        ExceptionEmptyProductionQueue - Thrown if the production queue is empty: there is no current production.

      • haveAction

        public boolean haveAction()
        Tell if there is an action.
        Returns:
        There is an action.

      • haveProduction

        public boolean haveProduction()
        Tell if there is a production.
        Returns:
        There is a production.

      • launchNewAction

        public void launchNewAction(Castle target,
                            int nbCatapults,
                            int nbKnights,
                            int nbPikemen)
                     throws ExceptionDukeNotPlayer,
                            ExceptionActionAlreadyLaunched
        Launch a new action of an army to a target.
        Parameters:
        target - Target castle where army will go.
        nbCatapults - Number of catapults in the army.
        nbKnights - Number of knights in the army.
        nbPikemen - Number of pikemen in the army.
        Throws:
        ExceptionDukeNotPlayer - Thrown if the duke of the castle is not playing: he can't launch an action.
        ExceptionActionAlreadyLaunched - Thrown if the castle leads already an action: he can't have two actions at the same time.

      • launchLevelProduction

        public void launchLevelProduction()
                           throws ExceptionDukeNotPlayer
        Add a level production to the queue, and take the cost in the treasure of the castle.
        Throws:
        ExceptionDukeNotPlayer - Thrown if the duke of the castle is not playing: he can't ask a production.

      • launchEntityProduction

        public void launchEntityProduction(java.lang.Class<? extends Entity> type)
                            throws ExceptionDukeNotPlayer
        Add a entity production to the queue, and take the cost in the treasure of the castle.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the entity to make.
        Throws:
        ExceptionDukeNotPlayer - Thrown if the duke of the castle is not playing: he can't ask a production.

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        Increase the castle's treasure, call nextTurn() on the current action and production. Called at each new turn.

      • receiveAttack

        public void receiveAttack()
        Receive an attack from an opponent's action.

      • receiveConquer

        public void receiveConquer(Duke newDuke)
        The castle is conquered by a duke during his action.
        Parameters:
        newDuke - New duke of the castle.

      • removeLastProduction

        public void removeLastProduction(boolean isCleanMode)
                          throws ExceptionEmptyProductionQueue,
                                 ExceptionDukeNotPlayer
        Remove the last production of the queue.
        Parameters:
        isCleanMode - Tell the context of call (true = during cleaning).
        Throws:
        ExceptionDukeNotPlayer - Thrown if the duke of the castle is not playing: he couldn't ask a production.
        ExceptionEmptyProductionQueue - Thrown if the production queue is empty: there is no current production.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Write a message that contains all information of the castle.

        Returns:
        Message that contains all information of the castle.
